metadata.description: Email address of the Extensions Kit owner
Name of the Extensions Kit owner
API Management available pricing tiers are: Consumption, Developer, Basic, Standard, Premium, Isolated

variables.policies:
<policies>
  <inbound>
    <base />
    <set-backend-service base-url="{{ExtensionsKitWebhookV2Uri}}/api/v2/triggers/http-webhook" />
    <!-- Get Token from Ids -->
    <send-request ignore-error="true" timeout="{{ExtensionsKitApiTimeout}}" response-variable-name="idsResponse" mode="new">
      <set-url>{{IdentityServicesUri}}/connect/token</set-url>
      <set-method>POST</set-method>
      <set-header name="Content-Type" exists-action="override">
        <value>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</value>
      </set-header>
      <set-body>@{
                        return "client_id={{InternalClientId}}&scope=u4ek-public-api&client_secret={{InternalClientSecret}}&grant_type=client_credentials";
                    }</set-body>
    </send-request>
    <!--  Handle Errors, Timeouts while getting access token-->
    <choose>
      <!--  in case of timeouts, the value of idsResponse is null -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["idsResponse"]) == null)">
        <return-response>
          <set-status code="429" reason="Too many request" />
          <set-header name="Retry-After" exists-action="override">
            <value>30</value>
          </set-header>
        </return-response>
      </when>
      <!--  Forward errors while getting access token -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["idsResponse"]).StatusCode != 200)">
        <return-response response-variable-name="idsResponse" />
      </when>
    </choose>
    <set-variable name="idsResponseObject" value="@( ((IResponse)context.Variables["idsResponse"]).Body.As<JObject>())" />
    <set-variable name="idsAccessToken" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["idsResponseObject"])["access_token"].ToString())" />
    <set-variable name="idsTokenExpiresIn" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["idsResponseObject"])["expires_in"]?.ToString() ?? "3600")" />
    <!-- Get TriggerDefinition from ExtensionsKit API -->
    <send-request ignore-error="true" timeout="{{ExtensionsKitApiTimeout}}" response-variable-name="triggerResponse" mode="new">
      <set-url>@("{{ExtensionsKitUri}}/api/v2/triggers/"+ context.Request.MatchedParameters["triggerId"])</set-url>
      <set-method>GET</set-method>
      <set-header name="Authorization" exists-action="override">
        <value>@("Bearer " + (string)context.Variables["idsAccessToken"])</value>
      </set-header>
    </send-request>
    <!--  Handle Errors, Timeouts while reading Trigger -->
    <choose>
      <!--  in case of timeouts, the value of triggerResponse is null -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["triggerResponse"]) == null)">
        <return-response response-variable-name="triggerResponse">
          <set-status code="429" reason="Too many request" />
          <set-header name="Retry-After" exists-action="override">
            <value>30</value>
          </set-header>
        </return-response>
      </when>
      <!--  Forward errors while getting trigger -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["triggerResponse"]).StatusCode != 200)">
        <return-response response-variable-name="triggerResponse" />
      </when>
      <otherwise />
    </choose>
    <set-variable name="triggerResponseObject" value="@( ((IResponse)context.Variables["triggerResponse"]).Body.As<JObject>())" />
    <set-variable name="triggerConfigObject" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerResponseObject"])["Config"] )" />
    <set-variable name="triggerConfig-AuthenticationType" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["AuthenticationType"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
    <choose>
      <when condition="@(((string)context.Variables["triggerConfig-AuthenticationType"]).Equals("Basic", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))">
        <!--  Flow requests  Basic  Authorization -->
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-user" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["UserName"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-password" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["Password"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-issuer" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["Issuer"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-basic" value="@("Basic " + Convert.ToBase64String(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(context.Variables["triggerConfig-Authentication-user"] + ":" + context.Variables["triggerConfig-Authentication-password"])) )" />
        <!--  Calculate authorization header value -->
        <check-header name="Authorization" failed-check-httpcode="401" failed-check-error-message="Not authorized" ignore-case="false">
          <value>@((string)context.Variables["triggerConfig-Authentication-basic"])</value>
        </check-header>
      </when>
      <when condition="@(((string)context.Variables["triggerConfig-AuthenticationType"]).Equals("U4IDS", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))">
        <validate-jwt header-name="Authorization">
          <openid-config url="{{IdentityServicesUri}}/.well-known/openid-configuration" />
        </validate-jwt>
        <set-variable name="jwtToken" value="@( context.Request.Headers["Authorization"]?.First()?.Substring("Bearer ".Length)?.AsJwt() )" />
      </when>
      <when condition="@(((string)context.Variables["triggerConfig-AuthenticationType"]).Equals("AAD", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))">
        <trace source="Trace">"AAD {{AADIdentityUri}}"</trace>
        <validate-jwt header-name="Authorization">
          <openid-config url="{{AADIdentityUri}}/.well-known/openid-configuration" />
        </validate-jwt>
        <set-variable name="jwtToken" value="@( context.Request.Headers["Authorization"]?.First()?.Substring("Bearer ".Length)?.AsJwt() )" />
      </when>
    </choose>
    <choose>
      <when condition="@(context.Variables.ContainsKey("jwtToken"))">
        <set-variable name="claimsFound" value="@{                                 
                    Jwt jwtToken = ((Jwt)context.Variables["jwtToken"]);
                    JObject triggerConfigObject = (JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"];
                    if (triggerConfigObject["ClaimRules"] != null && triggerConfigObject["ClaimRules"].Type == JTokenType.Object) {   
                        foreach(var rule in ((JObject)triggerConfigObject["ClaimRules"]).Properties()) 
                        {                        
                            var value = rule.Last()?.ToString();
                            string[] claims;
                            if (!jwtToken.Claims.TryGetValue(rule.Name, out claims)) {
                                return false;    
                            }
                            
                            switch (value)
                            {
                                case "{{Template-Tenant}}":
                                    value = triggerConfigObject["TenantId"].ToString();
                                    break;
                                case "{{Template-TriggerId}}":
                                    value = triggerConfigObject["TriggerId"].ToString();
                                    break;
                            }
                            if (!claims.Contains(value)) {
                                return false;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return true;
                }" />
        <choose>
          <when condition="@( ((bool)context.Variables["claimsFound"]) != true)">
            <return-response>
              <set-status code="401" reason="Requested claims not present" />
            </return-response>
          </when>
        </choose>
      </when>
    </choose>
    <!--  Don't expose APIM subscription key to the backend. -->
    <set-header name="Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key" exists-action="delete" />
  </inbound>
  <backend>
    <base />
  </backend>
  <outbound>
    <base />
  </outbound>
  <on-error>
    <base />
  </on-error>
</policies>

properties.description: Subscribers will be able to run 5 calls/minute up to a maximum of 100 calls/week.
Exposes the Webhook Metadata to be used from LogicApps and other third party products
[concat('Subscribers have completely ', parameters('apiManagementProductsUnlimitedName'),' access to the API. Administrator approval is required.')]

properties.value:
<policies>
  <inbound>
    <cors>
      <allowed-origins>
        <origin>*</origin>
        <!-- allow any -->
      </allowed-origins>
      <allowed-methods>
        <!-- allow any -->
        <method>GET</method>
        <method>POST</method>
        <method>PATCH</method>
        <method>DELETE</method>
      </allowed-methods>
      <allowed-headers>
        <!-- allow any -->
        <header>*</header>
      </allowed-headers>
    </cors>
    <set-backend-service base-url="{{ExtensionsKitWebhookUri}}/api/v1/triggers/http-webhook" />
    <rewrite-uri template="{triggerId}/swagger?sig={sig}" />
    <base />
  </inbound>
  <backend>
    <base />
  </backend>
  <outbound>
    <base />
  </outbound>
  <on-error>
    <base />
  </on-error>
</policies>

<policies>
  <inbound>
    <cors>
      <allowed-origins>
        <origin>*</origin>
        <!-- allow any -->
      </allowed-origins>
      <allowed-methods>
        <!-- allow any -->
        <method>GET</method>
        <method>POST</method>
        <method>PATCH</method>
        <method>DELETE</method>

      <allowed-headers>
        <!-- allow any -->
        <header>*</header>
      </allowed-headers>
    </cors>
    <set-backend-service base-url="{{ExtensionsKitWebhookV2Uri}}/api/v2/triggers/http-webhook" />
    <rewrite-uri template="{triggerId}/swagger?sig={sig}" />
    <base />
  </inbound>
  <backend>
    <base />
  </backend>
  <outbound>

  </on-error>
</policies>

<policies>
  <inbound>
    <base />
    <set-backend-service base-url="{{ExtensionsKitWebhookUri}}/api/v1/triggers/http-webhook" />
    <!--- Get IDS Token -->
    <send-request ignore-error="true" timeout="{{ExtensionsKitApiTimeout}}" response-variable-name="idsResponse" mode="new">
      <set-url>{{IdentityServicesUri}}/connect/token</set-url>
      <set-method>POST</set-method>
      <set-header name="Content-Type" exists-action="override">
        <value>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</value>
      </set-header>
      <set-body>@{
                        return "client_id={{InternalClientId}}&scope=u4ek-public-api&client_secret={{InternalClientSecret}}&grant_type=client_credentials";
                    }</set-body>
    </send-request>
    <!--  Handle Errors, Timeouts while getting access token-->
    <choose>
      <!--  in case of timeouts, the value of idsResponse is null -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["idsResponse"]) == null)">
        <return-response>
          <set-status code="429" reason="Too many request" />
          <set-header name="Retry-After" exists-action="override">
            <value>30</value>

    <set-variable name="idsAccessToken" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["idsResponseObject"])["access_token"].ToString())" />
    <set-variable name="idsTokenExpiresIn" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["idsResponseObject"])["expires_in"]?.ToString() ?? "3600")" />
    <!-- Get TriggerDefinition from ExtensionsKit API -->
    <send-request ignore-error="true" timeout="{{ExtensionsKitApiTimeout}}" response-variable-name="triggerResponse" mode="new">

    <choose>
      <!--  in case of timeouts, the value of triggerResponse is null -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["triggerResponse"]) == null)">
        <return-response response-variable-name="triggerResponse">
          <set-status code="429" reason="Too many request" />
          <set-header name="Retry-After" exists-action="override">
            <value>30</value>
          </set-header>
        </return-response>
      </when>
      <!--  Forward errors while getting trigger -->
      <when condition="@(((IResponse)context.Variables["triggerResponse"]).StatusCode != 200)">
        <return-response response-variable-name="triggerResponse" />
      </when>
      <otherwise />
    </choose>
    <set-variable name="triggerResponseObject" value="@( ((IResponse)context.Variables["triggerResponse"]).Body.As<JObject>())" />
    <set-variable name="triggerConfigObject" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerResponseObject"])["Config"] )" />
    <set-variable name="triggerConfig-AuthenticationType" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["AuthenticationType"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
    <choose>
      <when condition="@(((string)context.Variables["triggerConfig-AuthenticationType"]).Equals("Basic", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))">
        <!--  Flow requests  Basic  Authorization -->
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-user" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["UserName"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-password" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["Password"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-issuer" value="@( ((JObject)context.Variables["triggerConfigObject"])["Issuer"]?.ToString() ?? "" )" />
        <set-variable name="triggerConfig-Authentication-basic" value="@("Basic " + Convert.ToBase64String(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(context.Variables["triggerConfig-Authentication-user"] + ":" + context.Variables["triggerConfig-Authentication-password"])) )" />
        <!--  Calculate authorization header value -->
        <check-header name="Authorization" failed-check-httpcode="401" failed-check-error-message="Not authorized" ignore-case="false">
          <value>@((string)context.Variables["triggerConfig-Authentication-basic"])</value>
        </check-header>
      </when>

                                case "{{Template-TriggerId}}":

    <base />
